owing.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if money is owing, it has not yet been paid to the person who should receive it
owing.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: You need to pay the amount owing, plus the interest.
owing.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: an amount of money owing has not been paid yet
owing.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: We will send an estimate of the amount owing for the goods or services provided.
